name: Enforceability of lease contract
text:
PART 3.  EFFECT OF LEASE CONTRACT
 
     §490:2A-301  Enforceability of lease contract.  Except as otherwise provided in this article, a lease contract is effective and enforceable according to its terms between the parties, against purchasers of the goods, and against creditors of the parties. [L 1991, c 40, pt of §1]
